articles.title: DSWD: 3M boxes of family food packs prepositioned for possible storm
articles.description: The Department of Social Welfare and Development said its Disaster Response Command Center is now on blue alert status as it monitors the development of the LPA spotted east of Eastern Visayas.
articles.content:
